events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the senior software engineer position and will begin reviewing their qualifications in detail.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's experience as a software developer and relevant skills.
A recruiter specializing in technical placements has been assigned to manage this application and coordinate next steps.
Initial screening call completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated strong software engineering fundamentals and cultural fit.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to technical interviews.
A technical interview with the lead engineer has been scheduled for next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving ability.
